title: New: LinG. – Anthracite
content:
And to end the first lonely day of NOT BEING IN AUSTIN, this slaughterhouse of sounds, found in the debut cut from LinG.

A producer that we happen to know literally nothing about, other than the fact that he’s from the UK, which isn’t exactly interesting, is it? With support from Vessel and Throwing Snow however, there’s a high chance he’ll have to come out of the woodwork soon. In the meantime, enjoy Anthracite, it’s quite the ride.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
